startDate.description: The starting date and time of the event.

endDate.description: The ending date and time of the event.

eventUrl.description: URL to the webpage for the event.

get.summary: Fetches items listed on eBay based on specified criteria.
get.description: This endpoint allows users to fetch items listed on eBay based on specified criteria such as site ID, sorting parameters, keywords, maximum price, and filters such as free shipping and no bid.

parameters.name: _context
parameters.description: user prompt

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description: Specifies the eBay site to search from based on geographic location. The available options are: - 'EBAY_US' => 'United States' - 'EBAY_CA' => 'Canada' - 'EBAY_GB' => 'Great Britain' - 'EBAY_AU' => 'Australia' - 'EBAY_DE' => 'Germany' - 'EBAY_ES' => 'Spain' - 'EBAY_FR' => 'France' - 'EBAY_IT' => 'Italy'

parameters.name: sortId
parameters.description: Specifies the sorting criteria for the search results. The available options are: - 'BestMatch' => 'Best Match' - 'price' => 'Current Price Lowest' - '-price' => 'Current Price Highest' - 'newlyListed' => 'Newest Items First' - 'endingSoonest' => 'End Time Soonest'

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Specifies the keywords to be used in the search query.

parameters.name: maxPrice
parameters.description: Sets an upper limit for the price of the items in the search results.

parameters.name: freeShipping
parameters.description: Filters search results to only include items that offer free shipping.

parameters.name: isNoBid
parameters.description: Filters search results to only include items that have not received any bids.

200.description: The search operation was successful and a list of items has been returned.

get.summary: Fetches items listed on AliExpress based on specified criteria.
get.description: This endpoint enables users to fetch items listed on AliExpress by setting specific parameters like page number, currency ID, language ID, sorting options, and keywords.

parameters.name: _context
parameters.description: user prompt

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of the search results to return. Defaults to the first page if not specified.

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: Specifies the currency to be used in the search results. Available options include 'USD' for United States Dollar, 'EUR' for Euro, and 'GBP' for British Pound. Defaults to 'USD' if not specified. Currency options: - '0' => 'USD' - '1' => 'GBP' - '2' => 'CAD' - '3' => 'EUR' - '4' => 'UAH' - '5' => 'MXN' - '6' => 'TRY' - '7' => 'RUB' - '8' => 'BRL' - '9' => 'AUD' - '10' => 'INR' - '11' => 'JPY' - '12' => 'IDR' - '13' => 'SEK' - '14' => 'KRW'

parameters.name: sortId
parameters.description: Sort options: - '0' => 'SALE_PRICE_ASC' - '1' => 'SALE_PRICE_DESC' - '2' => 'DISCOUNT_ASC' - '3' => 'DISCOUNT_DESC' - '4' => 'LAST_VOLUME_ASC' - '5' => 'LAST_VOLUME_DESC'

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Specifies the keywords to be used in the search query.

200.description: Successfully returned a list of products

get.description: This endpoint retrieves items related to a specific eBay event.

parameters.name: _context
parameters.description: Context for the request.

parameters.name: siteId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Ebay site. It corresponds to specific countries/regions. Below is the mapping:
- EBAY_US: United States
- EBAY_AT: Austria
- EBAY_AU: Australia
- EBAY_BE: Belgium
- EBAY_CA: Canada
- EBAY_CH: Switzerland
- EBAY_DE: Germany
- EBAY_ES: Spain
- EBAY_FR: France
- EBAY_GB: Great Britain
- EBAY_HK: Hong Kong
- EBAY_IE: Ireland
- EBAY_IT: Italy
- EBAY_MY: Malaysia
- EBAY_NL: Netherlands
- EBAY_PH: Philippines
- EBAY_PL: Poland
- EBAY_SG: Singapore
- EBAY_TW: Taiwan
- EBAY_MOTORS: United States (Specific to Auto Parts and Vehicles)

parameters.name: eventId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the eBay event.

200.description: The search operation was successful and a list of event items has been returned.
